oracion1: Unit 4 - Loving and Caring for Animals
“I learned about houses. Quoper, you’re next.”

oracion2: This a farm and these are animals.

oracion1: What are the names of the animals?
oracion2: This is a cow and cows say “moo”.

oracion1: This is a dog and this is a cat. They like you!
This is a pig and this is a bird. They live on the farm.
Who takes care of the animals?
oracion2: The farmer takes care of the animals. He feeds them, grooms them, and gives them shelter.

oracion1: I like this farm. Thank you for teaching me. I will teach my alien friends about farms and animals. Goodbye.
